# Message from Vice Mayor Pam Foley

![Vice Mayor Pam Foley Standard Logo](https://www.sanjoseca.gov/home/showpublishedimage/23182/638736792011270000)

Dear District 9 Neighbors,Â 

Welcome to the District 9 website! It is an honor to serve the community where I have lived for over 35 years.

District 9 is home to an extensive network of schools, parks, and businesses creating a unique and vibrant community. As your Councilmember, I am committed to advocating for our residents and preserving the charm of our neighborhoods while creating opportunities for economic development.

Iâ€™m proud to have a team that is as dedicated as I to address the issues facing our District in a collaborative way that improves the quality of life in our neighborhoods and all San JosÃ© residents.

Donâ€™t forget to [subscribe to our newsletter](https://bit.ly/D9PamFoleyNewsletter) and follow our social media platforms ([Facebook](https://bit.ly/D9PamFoleyFacebook), [Instagram](https://bit.ly/D9PamFoleyInstagram), [Threads](https://bit.ly/D9PamFoleyThreads),Â [Nextdoor](https://bit.ly/D9PamFoleyNextdoor), [Medium](https://bit.ly/D9PamFoleyMedium)) to stay up to date with our office!

Now in my second term as your Vice Mayor and District 9 Councilmember, I look forward to making progress together in the years to come.

Thank you for visiting our website!Â 

Â ![Councilmember Pam Foley Signature](https://www.sanjoseca.gov/home/showpublishedimage/17645/638047961651130000)

Vice Mayor Pam Foley

* * *

## OUR MISSION

It is our duty to be an accessible and effective resource to improve the quality of life for our residents. Every day we strive to create vibrant and safe neighborhoods that our residents are proud to call home.

## OUR Vision

For all generations to thrive in a healthy, accessible, and inclusive community they cherish.

## OUR VALUES

**Community**

Most fundamentally, the people in this community represent the core of our work. This value pushes us to build relationships, collaborate successfully, and make San JosÃ© a better place for all.

**Integrity**

We are driven by honesty and integrity to honor our commitments to those we serve. We take pride in being respectful and professional in our work.

**Efficiency**

By utilizing the diverse skillset of our staff and clear communication, we are able to plan and operate effectively in order to improve the quality of life for the residents of San JosÃ©.

**Growth**

We use an open-minded approach when addressing the need for solutions. We look for new ways to expand our knowledge, innovate, and provide better service.
